markdownRemark.html: Greenlife Golf Club Marbella - Located in the hills of Elviría 9 km from Marbella. An exceptional hotel in a unique environment, surrounded by a golf course and with many services and things to do (tennis, gym, golf, restaurant with Michelin star, etc.). Greenlife Golf is a golf course with 9 regular 3-hole holes, with a great design so that beginners and more experienced players can both enjoy it. The course runs between a spectacular lake and a landscape with an abundance of vegetation. Among its facilities, there is a magnificent driving range with a golf academy, tennis courts, a complete gym and sauna, a pro-shop and the El Lago restaurant, a reference point in Andalusian gastronomy. It also offers accommodation in apartments and exclusive suites.

frontmatter.address: Urb. Elviria Hills Avda. Las Cumbres s/n, 29604 Marbella, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 23.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 23.00 euros
